item.title: 华润燃气削减股息后创下一年来最大跌幅
item.description: 华润燃气集团有限公司（China Resources Gas Group Ltd.）的股价创下一年来最大跌幅，此前该公司的盈利未达预期，并宣布将下调股息。【原文：China Resources Gas Group Ltd.’s shares fell the most in a year after the utility missed earnings estimates and announced it would lower its dividend.】

item.title: 日本为芯片初创企业 Rapidus 再拨 54 亿美元专款
item.description: 日本正准备为芯片初创公司 Rapidus Corp. 提供高达 8025 亿日元（54 亿美元）的额外援助，此举反映出东京在中美紧张局势加剧之际确保半导体供应的决心与日俱增。【原文：Japan is preparing as much as ¥802.5 billion ($5.4 billion) in additional aid for chip startup Rapidus Corp., a move that reflects Tokyo’s growing resolve to secure semiconductor supplies during a time of heightened US-China tensions.】

item.title: 中国工厂活动在特朗普关税预期出台前扩大
item.description: 3 月份，中国的工厂活动继续扩大，这对世界第二大经济体来说是个好消息，因为预计美国将征收关税，这可能会使贸易关系进一步紧张。【原文：China’s factory activity continued to expand in March, welcome news for the world’s No. 2 economy before expected US tariffs that could further strain trade ties.】

item.title: 美国关税担忧打击出口股，日本股市大跌
item.description: 由于对全球贸易战的担忧导致出口相关股票下滑，日本股市暴跌，日经股指有望创下 2020 年 3 月以来的最差季度。【原文：Japanese shares plunged, putting the Nikkei stock gauge on track for its worst quarter since March 2020, as export-related stocks slid on concerns about the global trade war.】

item.title: 中国第二大钢铁制造商年亏损近 10 亿美元
item.description: 鞍钢股份有限公司是中国第二大钢铁制造商的上市子公司，去年亏损近 10 亿美元，凸显了需求萎缩、价格暴跌的行业困境。【原文：Angang Steel Co Ltd., the listed arm of China’s second-biggest steelmaker, racked up a loss of nearly $1 billion last year, underscoring torrid conditions in the industry as demand shrinks and prices plunge.】

item.title: 聊天机器人聚合商 Wrtn 在最新的韩国人工智能交易中获得融资
item.description: Wrtn Technologies Inc.从包括 Goodwater Capital 在内的投资者那里筹集到了 830 亿韩元（约合 5600 万美元）的资金，这是在后 ChatGPT 时代获得融资的越来越多的韩国人工智能初创企业之一。【原文：Wrtn Technologies Inc. has raised 83 billion won ($56 million) from investors including Goodwater Capital, one of a growing number of South Korean AI startups to score financing in the post-ChatGPT era.】

item.title: 特朗普称将对所有国家征收互惠关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他计划开始对 "所有国家 "征收互惠关税，从而平息了人们对他可能会限制将于 4 月 2 日公布的初步关税范围的猜测。【原文：President Donald Trump said he plans to start his reciprocal tariff push with “all countries,” tamping down speculation that he could limit the initial scope of tariffs set to be unveiled April 2.】

item.title: 虫害和鼠害担忧继续拖累 Zensho 股票下跌
item.description: 日本连锁餐厅运营商 Zensho Holdings Co. 的股价下跌达 6.5%，此前该公司表示，在发生多起食品污染事件后，将暂时关闭大部分 Sukiya 门店。【原文：Shares of Zensho Holdings Co. fall as much as 6.5% after the operator of Japanese restaurant chains said it will temporarily close most of its Sukiya stores following multiple food contamination incidents.】

item.title: 韩国股市低开，长达数月的卖空禁令解除
item.description: 韩国股市周一下跌，原因是人们担心美国即将征收关税，以及长达 17 个月的卖空禁令被取消，预计这将引发短期波动。【原文：South Korean stocks declined on Monday, hurt by concerns over looming US tariffs and the removal of a 17-month long ban on short selling that is expected to trigger near-term volatility.】

item.title: 亚洲准备迎接特朗普关税对出口模式的历史性考验
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的对等关税给亚洲带来了一代人的挑战，亚洲领导人面临着艰难的抉择，该地区的经济是围绕对美出口和低贸易壁垒世界而建立的。【原文：Asian leaders face tough decisions as President Donald Trump’s reciprocal tariffs pose a generational challenge to a region whose economies were built around exports to the US and a world of low trade barriers.】

item.title: 美国新关税出台前日本产量创 11 个月最大增幅
item.description: 日本的工业生产创下了近一年来的最快增速，原因是制造商力图在美国对汽车和汽车零部件实施新关税之前满足强劲的需求。【原文：Japan’s industrial production grew at the fastest clip in nearly a year, as manufacturers sought to meet strong demand before the US implements new tariffs on autos and auto parts.】

item.title: 高盛认为美联储今年将采取更多削减措施，因为关税削弱了美国经济增长
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. economists now expect the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates three times this year as President Donald Trump’s tariffs weigh on economic growth and drive up unemployment.】

item.title: 比索涨势因菲律宾国际收支赤字而减弱
item.description: 在菲律宾中央银行将其对国家国际收支的预测从盈余调整为赤字后，菲律宾比索的涨势可能会耗尽。【原文：The Philippine peso’s rally may run out of steam after the central bank revised its projection for the nation’s balance of payments to a deficit from a surplus.】

item.title: 日本央行加息颠覆市场，日本面临全球最大债券损失
item.description: 在日本央行去年转向加息引发全球债市最大损失之后，投资者正在重新考虑他们对日本主权债券的投资策略。【原文：Investors are rethinking their strategies for Japanese sovereign bonds after the Bank of Japan’s pivot to interest-rate hikes in the past year triggered the biggest losses among global debt markets.】

item.title: 交易员权衡特朗普对俄罗斯的惩罚威胁，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁说，如果不能与乌克兰达成停火协议，将对俄罗斯原油实施新的惩罚，投资者在权衡这一威胁的影响后，石油价格趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied as investors weighed the fallout from President Donald Trump’s threat of fresh penalties on Russian crude if a ceasefire with Ukraine could not be reached.】

item.title: 英国外交大臣斯塔默在紧张周前与特朗普举行 "富有成效 "的会谈
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）周日晚与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普通电话，就 "经济繁荣协议 "进行了 "富有成效 "的讨论。【原文：UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer held “productive” discussions about “an economic prosperity deal” on a call with US President Donald Trump Sunday evening ahead of a crunch week in which the government hopes to carve out exemptions from looming US tariffs.】

item.title: 监管机构指出澳大利亚交易所存在严重合规问题
item.description: 澳大利亚市场监管机构和中央银行发现了交易所运营商澳大利亚证券交易所有限公司（ASX Ltd. ）在交易结算方面存在的严重问题，并表示需要立即采取行动加以解决。【原文：Australia’s markets regulator and the central bank identified serious issues at exchange operator ASX Ltd. related to trade settlement that they said need immediate action to resolve.】

item.title: 新西兰央行将在政治压力下审查银行资本要求
item.description: 新西兰中央银行表示，在政府的压力和行长意外辞职后，将重新审查银行资本要求。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank said it will review its bank capital requirements amid pressure from the government and following the unexpected resignation of its governor.】

item.title: 特朗普新关税出台前美国股指期货暴跌：市场综述
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普本周公布新一轮贸易关税之前，美国股票期货在亚洲早盘交易中下跌。在总统威胁对俄罗斯石油征收 "二次 "关税后，原油走高。【原文：US equity futures dropped in early Asia trading ahead of Donald Trump unveiling a fresh round of trade tariffs this week. Crude edged higher after the president threatened “secondary” levies on Russian oil.】

item.title: 贸易战担忧推动避险需求，黄金升至创纪录水平
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发布最新关税大棒之前，黄金在本周伊始就创下了历史新高，这也加剧了人们对全球贸易战的担忧。【原文：Gold started the week with a fresh record high, ahead of President Donald Trump’s expected latest tariff barrage that’s heightened concern of a global trade war.】

item.title: 澳新银行将新任首席执行官上任日期提前至 5 月 12 日
item.description: 澳新银行集团控股有限公司（ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.）表示，努诺-马托斯（Nuno Matos）将于 5 月 12 日开始执掌澳新银行，比原计划提前了两个月。【原文：ANZ Group Holdings Ltd. said Nuno Matos will now start at the helm on May 12, two months earlier than originally planned.】

item.title: 交易员担心全球外汇市场流动性可能低于表面现象
item.description:
重量级货币专家警告说，分散的、技术驱动的现代市场可能会带来麻烦。【原文：

Currency heavyweights warn the fragmented, tech-driven modern market could be storing up trouble.

】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 黑海地区脆弱的停火为欧洲粮仓小麦的全球装运带来了希望。美国将发布最新的玉米种植报告，这预示着世界最大谷物出口国的未来产量。全球能源交易商对美国的液化天然气趋之若鹜。【原文：A fragile ceasefire in the Black Sea brings hope for a boost in global shipments of wheat from Europe’s breadbasket. The US is set to release its latest corn plantings report, signaling future output for the world’s largest exporter of the grain. And energy traders across the world are hot for US liquefied natural gas.】

item.title: 澳大利亚股票 ETF 在经济下滑中创下季度流量纪录
item.description: 随着投资者在全球市场低迷的情况下纷纷涌入本地股票，追踪国内股票的澳大利亚交易所交易基金的净流入量有望创下历史最佳季度。【原文：Net flows into Australian exchange-traded funds tracking domestic equities are on track for their best quarter ever as investors pile into local shares amid a downturn in global markets.】

item.title: 与里维安和波士顿红袜叙旧
item.description:
电动汽车初创公司和波士顿棒球队的首席财务官讨论了业务战略、挑战等问题。【原文：

The CFOs of the EV startup and the storied Boston baseball team discuss business strategies, challenges and more.

】

item.title: 瑞银拓展财富服务，瞄准澳大利亚矿业资本
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）提拔蒂姆-克莱门格尔（Tim Clemenger）为其在珀斯的首位财富管理客户顾问，这是这家瑞士银行为吸引更多澳大利亚富人而采取的最新举措。【原文：UBS Group AG promoted Tim Clemenger to be its first client adviser for wealth management based in Perth, the Swiss bank’s latest move to attract more rich Australians.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易战升温之际，国债成为最佳选择
item.description: 全球贸易战愈演愈烈，加剧了美国经济增长急剧放缓的风险，并颠覆了投资者的投资组合。【原文：The intensifying global trade war is heightening risks of a sharp growth slowdown in the US and upending investors’ portfolios.】

item.title: 重要就业数据公布前，债券市场本周开局良好
item.description: 29 万亿美元的国债市场本月将表现强劲，投资者将关注贸易战风险和可能有助于美联储利率政策走向的关键劳工数据。【原文：The $29 trillion Treasury market is set to wrap up a strong month, with investors eyeing trade war risks and pivotal labor data that may help shape the path of Federal Reserve interest-rate policy.】

item.title: 美国吊销意大利埃尼公司在委内瑞拉生产天然气的许可证
item.description: 意大利能源公司埃尼（Eni）表示，美国当局已通知该公司，由于华盛顿对南美国家实施国际制裁，该公司不能再通过国有石油公司委内瑞拉国家石油公司（PDVSA）的石油供应来偿还其在委内瑞拉生产的天然气。【原文：Italian energy company Eni said it had been notified by US authorities that it can no longer be repaid for gas that it produces in Venezuela through oil supplies from state-owned PDVSA, as Washington exercises its international sanctions on the South American country.】

item.title: 大选局势紧张、特朗普关税加剧风险，澳大利亚央行将维持利率不变
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二将维持利率不变，因为它要等待一场因生活成本问题而展开的竞选活动，并为美国推动的全球贸易动荡所带来的经济影响做好准备。【原文：Australia’s central bank is set to keep interest rates unchanged on Tuesday as it waits out an election campaign fought on cost-of-living issues and girds for the economic impact of a US-driven upheaval in global trade.】
